previous_name.label: Previous name
previous_name.alert: You have not changed your name, so these fields are blank.

current_address.alert: You are not registering with a current address, so these fields are blank.

previous_address.alert: You are not registering with a change of address, so these fields are blank.

mailing_address.label: Mailing address
mailing_address.alert: Your mailing address is the same as your home address, so these fields are left blank.
